name: Phishing Attack
description: Trick the target into revealing sensitive information through deceptive means.

name: Brute Force Attack
description: Attempt to gain unauthorized access by trying all possible combinations of usernames and passwords.

name: SQL Injection
description: Exploit a vulnerability in a web application to execute malicious SQL queries.

name: DDoS Attack
description: Overwhelm the target system with a flood of internet traffic, rendering it unavailable to users.

name: Zero-Day Exploit
description: Exploit a previously unknown vulnerability in software or hardware.
